comments.text:
[Taras:  how late in the shutdown process is it possible to collect telemetry data and still have it get phoned home?  If it doesn't get uploaded immediately, would it get sent the next time the browser runs?]

We currently suspect that we drastically underutilize the memory cache.  We should add telemetry to find out how big it gets in practice.

Since it's empty at startup, I assume the most logical time to collect the data would be at shutdown.  Hence the question for Taras.
